channel.title: Projects on Angelo Ryndon
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Angelo Ryndon

item.title: MSA Project
item.description: View the repo Challenge Create a Web based project using Typescript, React, Azure, and ASP.NET Core. This is required to pass phase two of the Microsoft Student Accelerator internship I attended on my first year's summer break. Response I quickly read about the required tech-stack - I studied a bit of Typescript and React during those couple of weeks (luckily I already have some background with C# and JavaScript which made this a bit more manageable).

item.title: Connect Four
item.description: View the project Challenge Create a Web based Connect Four game. This is required to enter the Chingu team project. Response I used native JavaScript, some CSS and HTML for this project. As I was pressed for time while doing this, I used the ASP.NET Core boilerplate in Visual Studio. I believe that is a little overkill for a project of this scope, but I just wanted to get it done quickly.

item.title: Middlemore Motel
item.description: View the project Challenge Rebuild the website of Middlemore Motel. Make the site responsive and user-friendly. Response This is a simple website and I want to use just the right tool to complete the task, I didn't use a CMS as the client said he would rarely update the site's content. For development I used – ASP.NET MVC, Javascript, and Bootstrap SASS. I then used Git for version control. I also used 3rd party services – SocketLabs, Google API, and Welman Booking Engine.
